description.narrative: Health facilities in 18 districts provide quality comprehensive Prevention of Mother-to-Child Transmission of HIV services and scale up paediatric HIV and AIDS care services by 2016, which contributes to Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Hiv Prevention, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Protect, Care And Support Children And Families Affected By Hiv, Treatment And Care Of Children Living With Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 90% of children, adolescents and pregnant and lactating women utilize equitable, gender-sensitive HIV prevention, care and treatment services by 2018

title.narrative: Malawi United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals
Interagency Humanitarian Response Assessments and Plans

UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Malawi 2021 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Health facilities in 18 districts provide quality comprehensive Prevention of Mother-to-Child Transmission of HIV services andscale up paediatric HIV and AIDS care services by 2016
UNICEF-targeted HIV positive children in humanitarian situation who continue to receive ART
% of health facilities with ANC services with at least the minimum package of PMTCT services (2010: 78%, 2016: 100%)

actual.value: 2014:78% as of September 2014. The number of PMTCT sites being opened increases each quarter (denominator is 825)
